forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 47F. WNW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Monday Night
